reviews.review: 剧情玩一天 工坊玩一年

Рекомендую эту игру! Отличная головоломка. Имеется прикольный кооперативный режим. Можно создавать свои тесты. Также у игры имеется много классных модификаций как и 
на первый портал и на второй! Игра стоит своих денег! Всем советую в неё поиграть хотя бы на пиратке!
Its just a classic. Play it. You won't regret it. It will absorb you. It will also break your brain. But its all in the name of science.
This is such a good game would recommend
it fun and it good with co-op
its quite fun epecially messing around with friends
Still my favorite game of all time.

An incredible game with an amazing attention to detail. From a chamber from portal one at the start, knowing when you either trap yourself or skip a section. I can tell that the devs really cared about this game. Definitely  give it a try

hayatımda oynadıgım en güzel oyunlardan bir tanesiydi keşke çok çok daha önce oynasaydım bu başyapıtı.sadece bir bulmaca oyunu sanıyordum ama içinde barındırdığı hikayesi ile bütün duyguları yaşatıyor.hep bir heycanın içindesiniz oyun asla sıkmıyor aksine aşırı sürükleyici herkese tavsiye ederim

Really compelling story, that's very interesting, engaging, and fun. The characters are awesome, the pacing is great, the puzzles can be tough, but it occasionally felt like I was just repeating the same thing over and over towards the second half of the puzzles, just before the whole endgame section began.
Well worth the dollar or two it costs when on sale, even worth its non-sale price.
Solid game, 9/10
One of my top games of all time. Great gameplay, great voice acting, great story.... long game, lots of content (1 player is big on its own, then add in 2-player? cray cray). Get it.
People should have to complete this game before getting married.
It is just brilliant! It's worth fighting thrugh
Es mu entre tenido jugar con amigos

Одна из самых лучших моих покупок!
Всем советую)
I ignored the game way too long. Got it on sale at some point just to see what all the fuss was about and was pissing myself laughing all the way through. Brilliant and worth every penny.

I love the complexity of the game and how it feels like your actually trapped in this giant underground laboratory surrounded by robots. I also like the detail of the walls, the plants and debris. It looks absolutely incredible.
Хорошая головоломка, развивает мозги. Можно поиграть с друзьями.

This is one of the most interesting puzzle game that i have ever seen.
I really suggest players to play this game in Multiplayer mode.

Portal 2 is a fantastic sequel to the hit game Portal, and in my opinion 'perfectly' expands on the original games format, characters, story and world.  The puzzles are fantastic, the humor hilarious, and the graphics, though a bit older, still hold up decently enough, especially for the time.  I'd highly recommend it to anyone who is a fan of the first game.
Bazı noktalarda artık bulmacalar o kadar sıkıcı ve zor olsa da oyunun mizacı ve hikaye işleme tarzı tartışılamaz şekilde mükemmel. İndirimdeyken kesinlikle alın

mind bending physics puzzles, deadly lazers, comic relief from wonderfully voice-acted robots, the first few hours went by in a flash, this game has me hooked.
Fun and challenging. Solo and Co-op!
Idealna gra żeby trochę pomyśleć i jeszcze lepsza dla tych, którzy grają ze znajomym.

Si tienes amigos, es un gran juego para pasar el rato y desafiarse unos a otros. Por otro lado, si lo tuyo es jugar en solitario, gracias a la gran cantidad de mods y mapas, tendras incontables horas de desafios y pruebas logicas. Sin duda alguna vale la pena, más si lo pillas en oferta.
Great gameplay, awesome story, at this point if you haven't played this what are you doing with your life?

Its really a great game actually i was playing the whole weekend with my friend and now all whats in mind is this brilliant game i love the puzzles in when i solve it i feel like a genius and the The level of difficulty gradually increases In order not to get bored The design of the stages in most of the times is tidy and excellent to ideal in most stages because some stages the design is explicitly stupid
Отличная игра даже на 2к 19 год. Полностью прошёл и я полностью рад покупке. Рекомендую!
Super gra pod względem optymalizacji i względem graficznym :D pozdro 600

All right, I've been thinking, When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!
richtig geiles game. muss man gespielt haben
